Articles.Content:
At precisely 8:25 PM EST, the unmanned test flight of the Duna Return Vehicle Mk3 ended in the vehicle colliding at high speeds with the surface of Duna. During it's final descent, drogue chutes fitted to the spacecraft caused structural integrity loss, resulting in the spacecraft being torn into three separate pieces within three kilometers of the surface. The entire spacecraft crashed on the surface at more than 500 meters/second.

This report also announces the halt of the DRV program for the time being. The Sera Mission site is being decommissioned until further notice from the Kerbal Space Agency Public Affairs unit.
Sounds pretty brutal.. At least no one died?

Sounds pretty brutal.. At least no one died?

Luckily!
